org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.plugin.local

Interface SmartSelectionReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<SeReader>, Configurable, Nameable, SeReader

    public interface SmartSelectionReader
extends SeReader
    Interface implemented by readers able to handle natively the SE selection process (e.g. Android OMAPI readers).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApduResponse openChannelForAid(SeSelector.AidSelector aidSelector)
      Opens a logical channel for the provided AID

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.SeReader

        addSeProtocolSetting, getTransmissionMode, isSePresent, setSeProtocolSetting

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.util.Nameable

    • Method Detail

      • openChannelForAid

        ApduResponse openChannelForAid(SeSelector.AidSelector aidSelector)
                        throws KeypleIOReaderException,
                               KeypleChannelControlException,
                               KeypleApplicationSelectionException
        Opens a logical channel for the provided AID
        Parameters:
        aidSelector - the selection data
        Returns:
        an ApduResponse containing the SE answer to selection
        Throws:
        KeypleIOReaderException - if a communication error occurs
        KeypleChannelControlException - if channel control error occurs
        KeypleApplicationSelectionException - if selection error occurs
